field.doc: Auxiliary Sensor #1 output data bytes AUX1_OUT1 through AUX1_OUT6
Auxiliary Sensor #2 output data bytes AUX2_OUT1 through AUX2_OUT6

register.doc: Number of ODR cycles spent in wake state as measured in accelerometer ODRa_wake/ODRa_sleep periods. Data byte WAKE_CNT_L and WAKE_CNT_H.

register.doc: Number of ODR cycles spent in sleep state as measured in accelerometer ODRa_wake/ODRa_sleep periods. Data byte SLEEP_CNT_L and SLEEP_CNT_H.

register.doc: Reports the number of data packets (ODR cycles) currently stored in the buffer.
register.name: BUF_SMPLEV_L

register.doc: Reports the number of data packets lost since buffer has been filled.
register.name: BUF_PAST_L

register.doc: External Synchronous control register.
register.name: FSYNC_CTL

item.doc: FSYNC is disabled. SYNC pin is tri-stated.
item.name: disabled

item.doc: FSYNC is enabled. Sync pin is onfigured as input pin. Buffer is updated in sync with external clock applied at SYNC pin.
item.name: input_ext

item.doc: FSYNC is enabled. Sync pin is configured as input pin.State of SYNC pin is stored in selected sensor's LSB bit.
item.name: input

item.doc: FSYNC is disabled. SYNC pin is configured as output pin.
item.name: output

register.doc: This register reports the status of the sample buffer trigger function.
register.name: BUF_STATUS

field.doc: Latched buffer status information and the entire sample buffer are cleared when any data is written to this register.
Data from the buffer should be read using a single SAD+R command
